title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define the project scope, gather requirements, and create a detailed project plan.

title: Architecture and Design
description: Design the system architecture, define data models, create technical specifications. Ensure the architecture is modular, scalable, maintainable, and follows microservices and event-driven design principles. Develop data models for users, courses, progress tracking, and other entities. Specify APIs, data flows, and integration points. Address security, performance, and error handling requirements; include details on authentication, authorization, rate limiting, caching, and logging. Consider using containerized solutions like Docker and Kubernetes for deployment.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the user interface and implement the frontend functionality.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the server-side logic, APIs, and integration with external services.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema and data storage solutions.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the platform adheres to security best practices and compliance requirements.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute various testing activities to ensure the platform's quality and functionality.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, infrastructure, and monitoring for the platform.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the platform.
